thread.title_full: Funerals | News, Sports, Jobs - The Express

title: Funerals | News, Sports, Jobs - The Express
text: Funerals BRYAN — Kenneth F. Bryan, 74, of Mill Hall, died Feb. 15, 2024. A Funeral Service will be held today at 12 p.m., at the Salona Lutheran Church, 754 Long Run Road, Mill Hall. Friends and family will be received at the church for a time of viewing from 11 a.m. until the start of the service. Private burial will take place at St. Paul’s Cemetery, Mill Hall. SIMCOX — Susan Y. “Sue” Simcox, 76, formerly of Loganton, died Feb. 16, 2024, at Haven Place in Lock Haven. A viewing will be held this evening from 6-8 p.m. in the St. John Lutheran Church, 1450 W. Valley Road, Booneville. Funeral services will be held on Saturday, Feb. 24, at 11 a.m., in the St. John Lutheran Church, 1450 W. Valley Road, Booneville. Private interment will be held at the family’s convenience in the Tylersville Cemetery, Tylersville, Pa. McKEAGUE — Joyce M. McKeague, 90, formerly of Castanea, died Feb. 18, 2024. A visitation will be held on Saturday, Feb. 24, from 1-2 p.m., followed by the funeral service at 2 p.m. at Cedar Heights Brethren in Christ Church, 37 Cedar Heights, Mill Hall. Interment will be at Dunnstown Cemetery. HOXIE — Pauline V. Hoxie, 95, of Jersey Shore, died Feb. 15, 2024. A funeral service will be held at 2 p.m. on Saturday, Feb. 24, at the First United Methodist Church, 236 S. Main St., Jersey Shore. A visitation will be held from 12:30 p.m. until the time of service. Interment will be in the Jersey Shore Cemetery next to her husband. PHILLIPS — Elmer L. Phillips, 82, of Mill Hall, died Feb. 15, 2024. A Celebration of Life will be held for Elmer and his late wife, Margie, on Saturday, March 9, from 1-4 p.m. at the Beech Creek Fire Company social hall, 38 Locust St., Beech Creek. SHIRK — Deanna K. Shirk, 54, of Bald Eagle Street, Lock Haven, died Sunday, Feb. 11, 2024. Graveside services will be held on March 14, 2024, at Schenck’s Cemetery, Howard. KITCHEN — Charles Clifton “Mike” Kitchen, 80, of Beech Creek, died Jan. 30, 2024. A Celebration of Life will be held at the Friendship Community Center, Main St., Beech Creek, on Sunday, March 17, beginning at noon. THOMPSON — Mason S. Thompson, 17, of Tyrone, died Jan. 24, 2024. A Celebration of Life will be held at the Smith Family Pavilion in the spring that will be announced later. ZAKEM — Beatrice Anna “Gloria” Zakem, 94, formerly of Mill Hall, died Dec. 5, 2023. A memorial service is being planned to be held in the spring. STROUSE — Florence Virginia Walker Strouse, 86, of State College, died Dec. 10, 2023. A Celebration of Life will be held later, at a date and time that will be announced. ANDERSON — Betty (Hamm) Anderson, 77, of Lititz, Pa., died Dec. 31, 2023. A memorial service is being planned at the Lock Haven Salvation Army and will be announced once details are finalized. (wwwsnyderfuneralhome.com)
